message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe it's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $10,500. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with $10,500. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $10,250. Can we discuss further?
